UNDOGLOW_DESCRIPTION: Completely removes any Glow from a specified card
INVALID_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NO_CHARACTER: {{author}} The character on this card is no longer available on Sofi and cannot be interacted with
NO_GIF: {{author}} You cannot remove cosmetics from a **GIF** card
NOT_GLOWED: {{author}} That card has no **Glow** applied to it
UNG_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to remove this card's **Glow** for **100** **Silver**?
EMBED_FOOTER: The Glow will not return to your inventory
UNG_NO_OWNER: {{author}} The card is no longer in your collection
NOT_ENOUGH_SILVERS: You don't have enough **{{currency}}** for this process
UNG_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} Successfully removed the **{{glowName}}** **Glow** from your card
UNDOGLOW_EXTRA_INFO: Completely removes any Glow from a specified card. This change cannot be reverted
